content: So @csmoe I went over the list of calls to freevars. Mostly refactoring them to use the newer APIs seem straightforward, but what I realize now is I'm not entirely sure what work by @blitzerr has actually landed yet.
I left some minimal notes but I'm not sure if it's enough to figure out what to do
I could try to open an issue with more detailed notes on how to convert 1 or 2 of the examples (or maybe @blitzerr can do that, not sure if they remember what I am talking about =)
